verses.name: Proverbs 2:16
verses.text: To deliver thee from the strange woman, even from the stranger which flattereth with her words;

verses.name: Proverbs 2:17
verses.text: Which forsaketh the guide of her youth, and forgetteth the covenant of her God.

verses.name: Proverbs 2:18
verses.text: For her house inclineth unto death, and her paths unto the dead.

verses.name: Proverbs 2:19
verses.text: None that go unto her return again, neither take they hold of the paths of life.

verses.name: Proverbs 2:20
verses.text: That thou mayest walk in the way of good men, and keep the paths of the righteous.

verses.name: Proverbs 2:21
verses.text: For the upright shall dwell in the land, and the perfect shall remain in it.
